channel.title: Adding Just veng to spellbooks and an item
channel.description:
Ok. My Blank PI doesn't include a lunar spellbook. though it does have sprites for it.
What i am wanting to do is to two things.
First off switch out the final teleport for both ancients and Normal (a wildy one and ape atol i think) And make them veangeance. requiring the runes, and 94 mage. How do I do that so i get the animations right and the red skull to appear above them when it does? *no idea where to start*
second.
I want to take the cosmetic "Skull" item. which has no worth, does nothing etc. and change it so it has a "Vengeance" option. Which will make them do the emote and whatnot. but does NOT require 94 mage and runes. I can change item cost and whatnot.
also, i want it to be so depending on either one you use, it will require 30 seconds to use it again.

item.title: Adding Just veng to spellbooks and an item
item.dc:creator: @grayzai11 grayzai11
item.description:
@grayzai11 wrote:

Ok. My Blank PI doesn’t include a lunar spellbook. though it does have sprites for it.

What i am wanting to do is to two things.

First off switch out the final teleport for both ancients and Normal (a wildy one and ape atol i think) And make them veangeance. requiring the runes, and 94 mage. How do I do that so i get the animations right and the red skull to appear above them when it does? no idea where to start

second.

I want to take the cosmetic “Skull” item. which has no worth, does nothing etc. and change it so it has a “Vengeance” option. Which will make them do the emote and whatnot. but does NOT require 94 mage and runes. I can change item cost and whatnot.

also, i want it to be so depending on either one you use, it will require 30 seconds to use it again.

Read full topic
